DOC.brief_summary: The objective study evaluate pharmacokinetic profile digoxin administer alone administer repeat dose lurasidone 120mg .
DOC.brief_title: Digoxin Drug-Drug Interaction With Lurasidone HCl
DOC.criteria: Male female 18 65 year age BMI > = 19.5 < = 37 kg/m2 No clinically relevant abnormal laboratory value History presence renal hepatic insufficiency Participated clinical trial past 30 day Use con med prolong QT/QTc take within 28 day prior study drug administration
